releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 移除 黑名单
  2. 新增 “路径过滤器“, 支持"排除模式"(黑名单)和"仅包含模式"(白名单), 两者暂时无法同时使用
  3. 新增 全新的歌曲详情页面
  4. 新增 全新的更详细的更新对话框等
  5. 改进 菜单(几乎所有列表皆提供"播放","随机播放","下一个播放","加入列表"等)
  6. 开发 重构媒体读取
  7. 开发 引入 Jetpack Compose
  8. 其他 APK体积膨胀, 不再”小而美“
releaseNote.en:
1. Remove: Blacklist
  2. New: the Path filter, support "exclude mode" (blacklist) and "include mode" (whitelist),currently they can not be enabled at the same time
  3. New: Song Details Page
  4. New: brand new and detailed Upgrade Dialog and more
  5. Improve: menus (almost all lists provide "Play", "Shuffle Play", "Play Next","Add To Queues", etc.)
  6. Development: Refactor media reading
  7. Development: Introduce Jetpack Compose
  8. Other: APK is bloated, no longer "tiny but versatile"

releaseNote.zh-cn:
0.3.5.2
  1. 修复 因图片缓存配置错误而在主播放器出现的低像素图片
  2. 修复 扫描媒体对话框因加载结束前提前退出导致崩溃
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Low pixel images appearing in the main player due to image cache policy misconfiguration
  2. Fix: Scan Media Dialog crashes if early exit before the loading finished

releaseNote.zh-cn:
0.3.5.1 2022.10.8
  1. 修复 删除对话框不消失删除结果
  2. 修复 使用旧式方法浏览文件时无法解析歌曲
  3. 修复 歌曲内嵌图片过大时引起崩溃
  4. 修复 调整应用窗口大小时崩溃
0.3.5 2022.10.6
  1. 翻译 更新日语(aorinngo), 西班牙语(Armando de Nazareth)
  2. 修复 删除对话框无法滚动
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: randomly refresh playing queue on opening
  2. Improve: move swapping-queue operations (e.g. shuffle all, play a playlist, play an album/artist) tobackground, tofix getting frozen when changing queue especially for users having to many song
  3. Improve: designate a rational images size when loading cover artworks, to try to not crash app if the imageis toolarge

releaseNote.zh-cn:
翻译 更新 葡萄牙语(巴西)翻译 (Luiz-bro), 印度尼西亚语翻译 (Raven Ell (ravenel)), 荷兰语翻译 (Blinkin), 意大利语翻译 (gdonisi)

0.2.x 版本停更不再支持。
releaseNote.en:
Translations: Update Portuguese (Brazil) (by Luiz-bro), Indonesian (by Raven Ell ( ravenel)), Dutch (by Blinkin), Italian (by gdonisi)


v0.2.x no longer would receive new features.
